name: @yigitkonur/latitude-deno-sdk
description: Latitude Deno SDK - Community fork of the official Node.js SDK, rebuilt for Deno and Supabase Edge Functions

tasks.test:coverage: deno test --allow-net --allow-env --coverage=coverage src/tests/ && deno coverage coverage --lcov > coverage.lcov
tasks.examples:run: deno task examples && echo 'All examples type-check successfully'
tasks.version:patch: deno run -A scripts/bump.ts patch && git add deno.json && git commit -m "chore: bump version"
tasks.version:minor: deno run -A scripts/bump.ts minor && git add deno.json && git commit -m "chore: bump version"
tasks.version:major: deno run -A scripts/bump.ts major && git add deno.json && git commit -m "chore: bump version"
